english_translation: Do not seek wealth, be devoted to greatness.
You stay in good company, like an elder sister (or good presence).

kannada_original: ಇಲ್ಲಿ ಹನೊ, ಅಲ್ಲಿ ಹನೊ, ಎಲ್ಲಿಹನೊ, ಬಿಡು ಚಿಂತೆ ;
english_transliteration: Illi hano, alli hano, ellihano, biḍu cinte ;
english_translation: Is he here, is he there, where is he, leave the worry.
The place where (he) stands is Sri Shaila – Muddu Rama.
